page.title: 07PEOPLE'S JOBS IN CUCKFIELD 2
page.content: Unemployment is not really a problem within Cuckfield as most people go for jobs outside the village. The younger generation of males tend to opt for manual jobs whilst catering is popular amongst young females. People at present still seem able to follow their chosen career and do not seem to be dictated to by the availability of jobs. This may account for the fact that{59.3%}had 'great' job satisfaction,{25.9%}'fair' job satisfaction and only{14.8%}'little' job satisfaction. On starting their jobs{68.75%}earned{Â£0-Â£3000, 18.75% } earned{Â£3000-Â£9000}and{12.5%}earned { {Â£10,000-Â£16,000.}At present approximately{40%}of the people of Cuckfield earn above{Â£14,000}per year.
